Frank J. Donner Papers on the House Committee on Un-American Activities TAM 456
0.5 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box
circa 1958-1966 1
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.167.
Historical/Biographical Note
This collection contains the papers of Frank J. Donner (1911-1993), author of The Un-Americans, an account of HUAC's abuse of power and its opposition.
Scope and Contents
The papers contain collected clippings, editorials, and reports on the hearings, hearing transcripts, related flyers and newsletters and correspondence with Donner.
Conditions Governing Use
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it.
